participant_2.background:
I'll be running around town to get inspiration for my next mural.
i do not eat well.
i like pasta.
i like getting packages in the mail.
I am known for my dedication and work ethic.

content.text: Hello. How are you doing today?
Hello! I am doing well, thanks! I am running around town to get inspiration for my next mural.
That sounds exciting! I love murals. Are you going to make it for a specific location?
Yes, it's for a new coffee shop in town. I'm really excited to work on it.
I bet you are! I love getting to see how murals come together.
It's a lot of work, but it's so rewarding. I love being able to create something that will be enjoyed by the public for years to come.
That's a great perspective. I bet your murals make people happy.
I hope so! I love bringing a little bit of color and joy to people's lives.
I'm sure you do. You seem like a very creative person.
Thank you! I love to create things. It's one of my favorite things to do.
What other things do you like to do?
I love to cook, I love to play with my little girl, I love watching anime, and I love to read.
What about you? What are some of your favorite things to do?
I love to cook too! I love to spend time with my family, I love to go to concerts, and I love to watch movies.
Sounds like you have a lot of fun hobbies.
I do! I love to keep busy.
I'm the same way. I like to have a lot of different things to do.
It's good to have a variety of interests. It keeps life interesting.
